## Season to Soar Website

[Visit Website ›](https://www.seasontosoar.com/)

I serve as the Project Coordinator at Season to Soar, a nonprofit organization supporting underserved youth. I developed and manage the organization's website and technical infrastructure.\

Our most recent project was the Global Youth Leadership Panel, which brought together students and global changemakers for dialogue and development.\
[View event recap ›](https://www.seasontosoar.com/2025/06/03/global-youth-leadership-panel-at-bond-elementary/)

## Educational Justice Institute (EJI)

[Visit Website ›](https://edjusticeinstitute.com/home/)

As Director of Technology Initiatives, I built and maintain the EJI website, which supports K–12 students, educators, and researchers. This platform provides access to educational equity tools, journals, and programs.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## CDC NCHS Data Query System

[Launch Tool ›](https://nchsdata.cdc.gov/DQS)

At the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, I support a team of data analysts and statisticians in developing scalable public data tools. I contributed to the creation of the NCHS Data Query System, which allows users to interactively explore health statistics and custom reports.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## CDC Publication – Vaccination Coverage Study

[Read Publication ›](https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC6181259/)

As a CDC epidemiologist, I co-authored a study on vaccination coverage and exemption rates among kindergarteners in the U.S. This work supported national immunization strategies and informed state-level policy.
